formatted_address: L1, No. 2, Jalan Medini Utara 4, Iskandar Medini, 79250 Iskandar Puteri, Johor Darul Ta'zim, Malaysia
name: Health Screening Centre @ Gleneagles Medini

reviews.text: Although it is Gleneagles hospital but please expect delays and they are not well organised man power are limited and they can vanished halfway telling you it is their lunch break.   As a patient, I am sure you would like to be informed and updated on what are you waiting for.   I am surprised for their delivery of services for private hospital.

I did a comprehensive health screening at gleagleas medi. I am amazed with their service. The whole process took 4 hours +. I received my ultrasound report(received on the actual day to my email), blood test report & summary of the health report received on next day.

I was down with acute gastritis few week before i went for the health screening. It was good that they detect the baterials in my blood test.
Great Staff and great service . Very efficient and friendly from counter staff Nitsha and Farah to all the nurses it was an amazing experience!!! Thank you all for your hospitality and great work
The photo speak for itself. Never has this happened on any of my previous blood draws anywhere else. Bruising on arm after multiple failed attempts to draw blood.
Kind nurses,doctors and staffs, cozy waiting area. Overall,best experience ðŸ¤—

vicinity: L1, No. 2, Jalan Medini Utara 4, Iskandar Medini, Iskandar Puteri
